pr_title: [GEOS-9729] WMS XML Post request fails with Workspace qualifier in url

timeline.message:
[GEOS-9729] WMS XML Post request fails with Workspace qualifier in url

- added rawKvp null check in WMSWorkspaceQualifier.java
- added unit test to assert WMS POST request with workspace qualifier in
URL

timeline.bodyText: This is odd... it should not be working, "SF" is the spearfish workspace and topp:states is not in it, should reply that the layer is not found. I guess the patch is incomplete, maybe it's not setting the current workspace in the catalog?
timeline.author: aaime

replies.bodyText: Never mind, in the test states is placed in the "sf`` workspace.
replies.author: aaime
